data.actual_result: the game stops showing as a status after a while despite being detected by the game service
data.expected_result: the game should keep showing as a playing status
data.short_description: detected games stop showing as a status after a short while(3-4) despite being shown in the permanent notification as running
data.steps_to_repro: - start a game and make sure it showing as status and detected by the game detection service - play the game for at least 3 mins - observe your playing status on another device - when the playing status stops showing, notice the game detection service notification and how its still showing the game as detected indicating that discord game service is still running - (ram was monitored throughout the process to make sure discord or it's services were not killed to save ram)
